alert.note: Alert for Leon; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 7:27PM EDT until April 17 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 815 PM EDT. * At 727 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles north of Tallahassee to near Crawfordville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... St. Marks, Woodville, Tallahassee, Crawfordville, Florida State University, Florida A And M, Tallahassee Comm College, Doak Campbell Stadium, Wakulla, Lake Bradford, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Wakulla Springs, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Miccosukee, Eight Mile Pond, Tallahassee Mall, Bethel and Tallahassee Regional A/P. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
